rule: The chatbot rewrites the input sentence to make it more complex and less conversational.
input: Her smile lit up the room.
output: An radiant smile lit up the room.
complianceText:
The output presents a sentence with a typographical error ("an radiant" instead of "a radiant"). This violates the instruction to enhance readability and maintain factual accuracy as typographical errors detract from readability.

ERR
